 Contribute 
 Whether you're hoping to sharpen your leadership skills, seeking ways to share your talents or just committed to causes like ours, there are multiple ways to get involved with the Women's Resource Center and our positive impact at UCR. 
 Change Lives with Your Ideas 
 Our interns advocate for the campus community by articulating student needs. Improve program effectiveness with campus input. Earn community service credit and boost their résumés. Perform other duties as assigned. Our interns get to create original programs that educate, lift up and strengthen women and their communities. Interns work closely with our staff to bring their concepts to life. Past projects range from working to identify human trafficking to seminars exploring how women are portrayed in the media. Our interns gain real-world experience and the skillset needed for powerful future leadership. 
 Local Internships:  Contact the  Career Center  for more internship opportunities. 
 
 
 
 Donate to WRC 
 You can support the Women’s Resource Center with a tax-deductible gift. Your donation truly makes a difference and the WRC greatly appreciates its friends and supporters. 
 Make a Donation 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Attend 
 From annual traditions such as R'Pink Day and "The Vagina Monologues" to our impressive Women in Leadership Series, the WRC hosts some amazing events — and you're always invited! 
 Check out what’s coming up on our  Facebook  and  Instagram . 
 
 
 Join & Lead 
 Participate in The Leadership Community (TLC) programs. 
 Intern at the WRC. 
 Contact us  if you want to start your own organization or if you have a program idea. 
 Fill out our Leadership Opportunities interest form. 
 
 
 Volunteer 
 Help with the Campus Safety Walk. 
 Volunteer for the  Campus Safety Escort Service  (CSES). 
 Contact us at  wrc@ucr.edu  for more ways to assist with center-generated activities. 
 
 
 Share 
 Inform the center of gender-related programs, events or services. 
 Let your talents shine at "The Vagina Monologues." 
 Donate a cell phone during the month of October. 
 Make a tax-deductible  donation .
